definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sojourn (cf. Ar. ja0ra turn aside tarry, v. esp. III. IV. VIII. X; Aram. gor Eth in der.)—

sojourn, dwell for a (defintie or indef.) time, dwell as a new-comer (cf. [[גֵּר]]) without original rights, v. esp. Ge 19:9 (J) De 18:6 & cf. Ju Jdg 17:7, Jdg 17:8, Jdg 17:9, Jdg 19:1; also Ge 12:10, Ge 20:1, Ge 21:23, Ge 21:34, Ge 32:5, Ge 47:4 (all JE); of partriarchs in Canaan Ge 26:3 (J) Ge 35:27, Ex 6:4 (both P) cf. Ps 105:12 = 1Ch 16:19, Ju Jdg 19:16, 2Sa 4:3, 2Ki 8:1, 2Ki 8:1, 2Ki 8:2 (seven years) Is 16:4, Ru 1:1, Ezr 1:4 (in exile); cf. further Ex 3:22 (E) [[גׇּרַת בַּיִת]] of a woman in another's house as lodger or guest (v. Di), [[גׇּרֵי בַיִת]] Job 19:15; so (poet.) of worshipper in Yahweh's house Ps 15:1, Ps 61:5 cf. Is 33:14, Is 33:14; fig. of evil [[לאׁ יְגֻֽרְךָ רָָע]] Ps 5:5 evil cannot be a guest of thine (Che; sq. acc., as in Ar. j0wrh III); particulary of the [[גֵּר]] (q.v.) in Israel Ex 12:48, Ex 12:49, Le 16:29 (all P) Le 17:8, Le 17:10, Le 17:12, Le 17:13, Le 18:26, Le 19:33, Le 19:34, Le 20:2, Le 25:6, Le 25:45 (all H) Nu 9:14, Nu 15:14, Nu 15:15, Nu 15:16, Nu 15:26, Nu 15:29, Nu 19:10, Jos 20:9 (all P) Ez Eze 14:7, Eze 47:22, Eze 47:23; of Ephraim and Manasseh sojourning with Judah and Benjamin 2Ch 15:9; of Rechabites sojourning in Judah Je 35:7; of Israelites sojourning in Egypt De 26:5, Is 52:4, Ps 105:23; so of Judah, to escape from under Babylonian power Je 42:15, Je 42:17, Je 42:22, Je 43:2, Je 44:8, Je 44:12, Je 44:14, Je 44:28.

abide, nearly or quite = dwell Je 43:5 cf. La 4:15, Je 49:18, Je 49:33, Je 50:40, also Job 28:4; of wolf dwelling with lamb Is 11:6; stay (inactive) Ju Jdg 5:17 ;—in Is 5:17 rd. perh., for [[גׇּרִים]], [[גְּדָיִם]] or [[כָּרִים]] cf. LXX Lo Ew Di & Che crit. n. (> Stu [[גֵּרִים]])

definitions.title: Hithpol.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מִתְגּוֹרֵר]] 1Ki 17:20 seek hospitality with, sq. [[עִם]] (cf.Ar. x); [[יִתְגּוֹרָâרוּ]] Ho 7:14 is dub. (cf. II. [[גור]]); AE Ki Thes Wü AV RV they assemble themselves, but txt. prob. err., v. [[גדד]].
